language.name: jq
language.title: JQ
language.description: Evaluates a JQ expression against a JSON message body.
language.label: language,json

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

headerName.label: advanced
headerName.description: Name of header to use as input, instead of the message body It has as higher precedent than the propertyName if both are set.

propertyName.label: advanced
propertyName.description: Name of property to use as input, instead of the message body. It has a lower precedent than the headerName if both are set.

resultType.description: Sets the class of the result type (type from output)

trim.label: advanced
trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
